title: Bug 3666: Code completion eats too much code
description: Under certain circumstances, code assist in the IDE is consuming more code than expected. This behavior can be reproduced with the following steps:
SR:
1. Change the `baz` call to
   `baz(x.x.foo())`
2. Place the cursor after the first "x."
3. Press Ctrl + Space to bring up code assist
4. Type "f" to filter the list
5. Select "foo()"
